text: Sharon Pratt (born January 30, 1944), formerly Sharon Pratt Dixon and Sharon Pratt Kelly, is an American attorney and politician. She was the third Mayor of the District of Columbia from 1991 to 1995. Pratt was the first African American woman to serve as mayor of a major American city. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:Mayors of Washington, D.C. Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:African- American politicians
title: Sharon Pratt
